verses.name: 2 Samuel 23:4
verses.text: And he shall be as the light of the morning, when the sun riseth, even a morning without clouds; as the tender grass springing out of the earth by clear shining after rain.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 23:5
verses.text: Although my house be not so with God; yet he hath made with me an everlasting covenant, ordered in all things, and sure: for this is all my salvation, and all my desire, although he make it not to grow.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 23:6
verses.text: But the sons of Belial shall be all of them as thorns thrust away, because they cannot be taken with hands:
